select.p: This is a demo of a custom autocomplete component built with Shadcn ui and Fancy Multi Select by Maximilian Kaske. Feel free to play around with it and customize it to your needs.
The Multi Select Component is inspired by campsite.design's and cal.com's settings forms.
A multi-select component designed with shadcn/ui.

switch.p: A fancy switch component built with shadcn/ui.

form.p: ðŸŒŸ A React component that automatically creates a @shadcn/ui form based on a zod schema.

button.p: An enhanced version of the default shadcn-button component.

input.p: Capture-Photo is a versatile, browser-based React component designed to streamline the integration of camera functionalities directly into your web applications.
A highly customizable, accessible, and fully-featured tag input component built with shadcn/ui.
The Textarea is inspired by GitHub's PR comment section. The impressive part is the @mention support including hover cards in the preview. The goal is to reproduce it without text editor library.

input.h1: Phone input number component with Shadcn UI
input.p: Custom phone number component built with shadcn/ui.
The SearchAddress component provides a flexible and interactive search interface for addresses, utilizing the powerful Nominatim service from OpenStreetMap.
An address autocomplete component built with Google Places API and shadcn components.
Simple and formatted phone input component built with shadcn/ui y libphonenumber-js.
Customizable phone input component with proper validation for any country.

dialog.p: A confirm dialog component built with shadcn/ui.
Ready-made responsive modal component for shadcn/ui.

dropdown.p: This Component is built with Nextjs, Tailwindcss, shadcn/ui & Zustand for state management.

charts.p: Crypto charts made for shadcn/ui using PythNetwork.

date-picker.p: DateRangePicker is a reusable component for shadcn using Radix UI and Tailwind CSS. Includes preset date ranges, text entry, calendar selection and date comparison
Beautifully crafted datetime picker component using shadcn ui
A smart datetime picker which understands natural language input.
Advanced date picker with range selection, year and month selection, and more.
A simple TimePicker for your shadcn/ui project.

combobox.p: Combobox/autocomplete component built with shadcn/ui and Downshift.
The Combobox is inspired by GitHub's PR label selector and is powered by shadcn/ui. Almost all elements are radix-ui components, styled with tailwindcss.
A copy of the combobox that Linear uses to set the priority of a task.

rich-text-editor.p: A modern WYSIWYG rich-text editor base on tiptap and shadcn/ui.
A minimal WYSIWYG editor built with shadcn/ui and tiptap.
Novel is a Notion-style WYSIWYG editor with AI-powered autocompletion. Built with Tiptap + Vercel AI SDK.

file-upload.p: A file uploader built with shadcn/ui and react-dropzone.
Image upload component built with shadcn/ui.

background.p: Ready to use collection of modern background snippets.

email.p: Craft beautiful emails effortlessly with Maily, the powerful email editor that ensures impeccable communication across all major clients.

dnd.p: Sortable Drag and Drop with Next.js, shadcn/ui, and dnd-kit.
Drag and drop Accessible kanban board implementing using React, dnd-kit, tailwind, and shadcn/ui.

pagination.p: shadcn paging/pagination that uses Nextjs Links and search params

payment.p: This repository demonstrates how to integrate popular payment gateways like Stripe, Razorpay, PayPal, and Coinbase into a web application using Next.js 14.

calender.p: Planner is a highly adaptable scheduling component tailored for React applications.
Planner is a highly adaptable scheduling component tailored for React applications.
A copy of the monthly calendar used by Cal.com with shadcn/ui, Radix Colors and React Aria.
Modern alternative to primitive react heatmaps built on top of shadcn/ui calendar component.
A calendar date picker component designed with shadcn/ui.

card.h1: Pricing Page made with Shadcn UI
card.p: Pricing Page made with shadcn/ui & Next.js 14. Completely customizable.

table.p: shadcn/ui table component with server-side sorting, filtering, and pagination.

images.p: A minimal image cropper UI built with shadcn and the react-image-crop library!
